April.2016

ENJOY, RELAX, EVERYDAY

This is a concept of this community
This community is made by me
Why did this community is made ?
Firstly, I want to want to spice up my life.
Seconcly, Make an opportunity to use other language
Thirdly, Communicate with other language people anywhere

Hello .I'm taiga language learner .I started english alsomst four years ago. Since then I started english i've been have a purpose in my life .

I've done learning english more than 4 hours every day . I've taken advantage of Youtube and bbc news also other text-book.This year focused on Listening and writing.

I had been learning english 4 hours by using a hello talk and YouTube and reading westernbook. I've started to read "Harry Potter" for the first time in my life.Also i started French from my interest.And I realized French and English have a lot of similarities compare with japanese.

I started learning German and programming in English .In this year I bought first laptop in my life.So i really straggled with even a typing.But gradually i understood like how to do capital c , where is question mark like that. Finally i could have operated my laptop as well as who can use laptop.

I realized that latin language has etymology .So I looked up on the internet about etymology.I went to abroad for the first time(Manila.Philippine ). And I've felt that pronounciation was very important through intern.

"Goal" I've accepted english examination .And I'll continue on programming on a udemy also make a some portfolio and learn UI design and UX design .And then finally wanna get a job as a programmer .

My goal has been not changed since 4 years ago .
My future goal is to move into English country
Also travel many countries.
I want to do base on relax, enjoy, everyday.

＼ Thank you very much for visit this site ! , shall we learn with us ?／
